solution.text:
Height of barrel, h \(=_{j}_\)m
Diameter of barrel, d \(=_{k}_\)m
\(\Rightarrow\) Radius, r \(=_{{Fraction(k,2)}}_=_{{k/Decimal(2)}}_\)m
Total surface area of barrel \(_{{trunc((2*pi_val*(k/Decimal(2))*(j+(k/Decimal(2)))),3)}}_m^2\)
Quantity of metal actually used\(=\)total surface area of barrel \(+\,_{l}_\)% of total surface area
\(=_{{1+(l/Decimal(100))}}_ \times\) total surface area
\(=_{{1+(l/Decimal(100))}}_ \times _{{trunc((2*pi_val*(k/Decimal(2))*(j+(k/Decimal(2)))),3)}}_\)
\(=_{{trunc(((1+(l/Decimal(100)))*2*pi_val*(k/Decimal(2))*(j+(k/Decimal(2)))),3)}}_m^2\)

content.text: How much metal was actually used, if \(_{l}_\)% of the metal actually used was wasted in making the barrel.
